lead_paragraph: The girl died Monday after being critically injured the day before, when facade from the eighth floor fell on her and her grandmother as they sat on a sidewalk bench on the Upper West Side.

headline.print_headline: Falling Bricks Injure Girl, 2, in Manhattan
headline.main: Girl, 2, Dies After Being Hit by Falling Facade in Manhattan

snippet: The girl died Monday after being critically injured the day before, when facade from the eighth floor fell on her and her grandmother as they sat on a sidewalk bench on the Upper West Side.
abstract: Two-year-old girl Greta Greene of Brooklyn dies after being struck by falling bricks from building on Manhattan's Upper West Side; Greene's grandmother, Susan Frierson, is injured in accident.
